body:
Dear Customer [CUSTOMER_NAME],

Congratulations, your account has been successfully created. Welcome to Ourlane
[OTP] is your Verification Code (OTP) for mobile number verification. PLEASE DO NOT SHARE

Dear [CUSTOMER_NAME],

Your booking is confirmed 

Trip ID - [TRIPID] 

From (pick-up location) [SOURCE] 

To (drop location) [DESTINATION] 

Vehicle Number - [VEHICLE_NUMBER] 

OTP [OTP] - 

Driver Mobile Number - [DRIVER_MOBILE] 

Thank You!

Dear [CUSTOMER_NAME]

Your ride is scheduled for [TIME] (Time). Please be there at your pick-up point on time

Dear [CUSTOMER_NAME]

[OTP] one-time password to proceed with your ride scheduled at [TIME]

From (pick-up)           [SOURCE]

To (drop location)             [DESTINATION]

Vehicle Number          [VEHICLE_NUMBER]

OTP               [OTP]

Driver Mobile Number         [DRIVER_MOBILE]
